title: Strategic Action Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Living Water International in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: I had an interview with the recruiter and the hiring manager. The interview lasted about 45 minutes. They asked me questions about myself and about the role - none of the questions were overly complex.
Interview Questions: When was a time I had to stand up for someone/something at work?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Living Water International
Interview Descriptions: Straight forward and on top of it. Easy to follow instructions. Prompt responses and easy communication. Overall a good experience. The the kennel is available now and I can pick up the dog and bring her home.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years.

title: Marketing and Communication Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Living Water International (Houston, TX) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions:
After submitting an application online, there were two rounds of interviews:
A phone interview with HR, asking very basic general interview questions
Then, a skype interview with HR and potential supervisor, asking more about why I felt like I was the right choice for the position.
Interview Questions: Why should you get the position as opposed to a marketing major?
